description: A 37-year-old man is accused of murdering a five-year-old girl in Iraq in 2015.
title: Genocide trial: IS suspect in court in Germany
title_page: Genocide trial: IS suspect in court in Germany - BBC News
maintext: The suspect's wife is accused of war crimes for doing nothing to try to save her and could face life in jail. Jennifer W allegedly went to Iraq in 2014 and became a member of IS's self-styled morality police. She was arrested later in Turkey.
